tit.j: きょうと京北ふるさと公社
tit.e: The Kyoto Keihoku Furusato (hometown) public corporation
tit.cmt: タイトルなので大文字にしました。The 削除しました。

sen.j: きょうと京北ふるさと公社（きょうとけいほくふるさとこうしゃ）は、京都府京都市右京区京北上弓削町段上ノ下にある。
sen.e: The Kyoto Keihoku Furusato (hometown) public corporation is located at Danjo no shita, Keihoku-kamiyuge-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The Kyoto Keihoku Furusato (hometown) public corporation is located at Danjo no shita, Keihoku Kamiyuge-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: Keihoku Kamiyuge-choハイフン削除し、大文字にしました。
sen.e: The Kyoto Keihoku Furusato (hometown) public corporation is located at Danjo no shita, Keihoku Kamiyuge-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 京都府京都市の旧京北町でバス事業や公園、人材派遣業などを営む財団法人である。
sen.e: It is a foundation engaged in the provision of a bus and temporary personnel services and the management and operation of a park in Keihku-cho, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処 http://utsukyoh.fuw.jp/
sen.e: It is a foundation engaged in the provision of a bus and temporary personnel services and the management and operation of a park in Keihoku-cho, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
It is a foundation engaged in the provision of a bus and temporary personnel services and the management and operation of a park in Keihoku-cho, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 正式名称は、京北ふるさとバスである。
sen.e: The official name is Keihoku Furusato Bus.
The official name is Keihoku Furusato Bus.
The official name is Keihoku Furusato Bus.

sen.j: 京北町の京都市への編入合併にともない、当財団法人に町営バスの運営が引き継がれたもの。
sen.e: When Keihoku-cho was absorbed into Kyoto City, this foundation took over the municipal bus operations.
When Keihoku-cho was absorbed into Kyoto City, this foundation took over the municipal bus operations.
When Keihoku-cho was absorbed into Kyoto City, this foundation took over the municipal bus operations.

sen.j: 現在は、以下の路線が運行されている。
sen.e: At present, the following routes are in service.
At present, the following routes are in service.
At present, the following routes are in service.

sen.j: なお、後に記されている運行区間は主なものである。
sen.e: The major routes are described below.
sen.cmt: 「なお」は訳出していません。 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The major routes are described below.
The major routes are described below.

sen.j: すべて旧・京北町内だけで完結している。
sen.e: They cover only former Keihoku-cho.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: They cover only former Keihoku-cho.
They cover only former Keihoku-cho.

sen.j: 田貫線 周山～下弓削～京北病院前～上佐々江
sen.e: Tanuki Route: Shuzan - Shimoyuge - Keihoku Byoin mae (Keihoku Hospital) - Kamisasae
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Tanuki Route: Shuzan - Shimoyuge - Keihoku Byoin mae (Keihoku Hospital) - Kamisasae
Tanuki Route: Shuzan - Shimoyuge - Keihoku Byoin mae (Keihoku Hospital) - Kamisasae

sen.j: （一部便はゼミナールハウス経由あるいは発着。）
sen.e: (Some busses travel through Kyoto Seminar House, or depart from or arrive at there.)
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: (Some busses travel through Kyoto Seminar House, or depart from or arrive at there.)
(Some busses travel through Kyoto Seminar House, or depart from or arrive at there.)

sen.j: 弓削線 周山～下弓削～京北病院前～上弓削～千谷口
sen.e: Yuge Route: Shuzan - Shimoyuge - Keihoku Byoin mae (Keihoku Hospital) - Kamiyuge - Sendaniguchi
Yuge Route: Shuzan - Shimoyuge - Keihoku Byoin mae (Keihoku Hospital) - Kamiyuge - Sendaniguchi
Yuge Route: Shuzan - Shimoyuge - Keihoku Byoin mae (Keihoku Hospital) - Kamiyuge - Sendaniguchi

sen.j: 矢代線 周山～太田～京北病院前～上熊田～浅江
sen.e: Yashiro Route: Shuzan - Ota - Keihoku Byoin mae (Keihoku Hospital) - Kamikumata - Azae
Yashiro Route: Shuzan - Ota - Keihoku Byoin mae (Keihoku Hospital) - Kamikumata - Azae
Yashiro Route: Shuzan - Ota - Keihoku Byoin mae (Keihoku Hospital) - Kamikumata - Azae

sen.j: 宇津線 周山～太田～下熊田～宇津保育園前～柏原
sen.e: Utsu Route: Shuzan - Ota - Shimokumata - Utsu-hoikuen-mae (Utsu Nursery Center) - Kashiwabara
Utsu Route: Shuzan - Ota - Shimokumata - Utsu-hoikuen-mae (Utsu Nursery Center) - Kashiwabara
Utsu Route: Shuzan - Ota - Shimokumata - Utsu-hoikuen-mae (Utsu Nursery Center) - Kashiwabara

sen.j: 細野線 周山～細野～余野、周山～細野～下長野
sen.e: Hosono Route: Shuzan - Hosono - Yono, Shuzan - Hosono - Shimonagano
Hosono Route: Shuzan - Hosono - Yono, Shuzan - Hosono - Shimonagano
Hosono Route: Shuzan - Hosono - Yono, Shuzan - Hosono - Shimonagano

sen.j: 山国・小塩線 周山～周山中学校～比賀江～山国御陵前～小塩（京北病院経由もあり）
sen.e: Yamaguni Oshio Route: Shuzan - Shuzan Junior High School - Higae- Yamaguni-Goryo-mae - Oshio (some buses travel through Keihoku Byoin mae (Keihoku Hospital))
Yamaguni Oshio Route: Shuzan - Shuzan Junior High School - Higae - Yamaguni Goryo-mae - Oshio (some buses travel through Keihoku Byoin mae [Keihoku Hospital])
sen.cmt: スペース補足しました。Yamagami Goryo-maeに訂正しました。括弧内括弧を[]に訂正しました。
sen.e: Yamaguni Oshio Route: Shuzan - Shuzan Junior High School - Higae - Yamaguni Goryo-mae - Oshio (some buses travel through Keihoku Byoin mae [Keihoku Hospital])

sen.j: 山国・黒田線 周山～周山中学校～比賀江～山国御陵前～下黒田～灰屋
sen.e: Yamaguni Kuroda Route: Shuzan - Shuzan Junior High School - Higae- Yamaguni-Goryo-mae - Shimokuroda - Haiya
Yamaguni Kuroda Route: Shuzan - Shuzan Junior High School - Higae - Yamaguni Goryo-mae - Shimokuroda - Haiya
sen.cmt: スペース補足しました。Yamagami Goryo-maeに訂正しました。
sen.e: Yamaguni Kuroda Route: Shuzan - Shuzan Junior High School - Higae - Yamaguni Goryo-mae - Shimokuroda - Haiya

sen.j: 京都市の交付する「敬老乗車証」で利用することが出来る。
sen.e: Freedom passes for older people issued by Kyoto City can be used on these bus services.
Freedom passes for older people issued by Kyoto City can be used on these bus services.
Freedom passes for older people issued by Kyoto City can be used on these bus services.

sen.j: 京都市の予算から運行補助のために約5,000万円が支出されている。
sen.e: Kyoto City provides about 50 million yen in subsidies to cover part of the operating costs.
Kyoto City provides about 50 million yen in subsidies to cover part of the operating costs.
Kyoto City provides about 50 million yen in subsidies to cover part of the operating costs.
